body.name: Lincoln Logs – 100th Anniversary Tin, 111 Pieces, Real Wood Logs - Ages 3+ - Best Retro Building Gift Set For Boys/Girls - Creative Construction Engineering - Preschool Education Toy
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 18. Order within 5 hrs 54 mins

features: A LINCOLN LOGS CLASSIC, JUST THE WAY YOU REMEMBER IT – Inspired by one of the original LINCOLN LOGS builds, the "Meeting House," this 100th Anniversary Tin will evoke nostalgia in older generations and bring happiness to children. The manual offers three building ideas: a tall tower, two small houses with a bonfire, and a large cabin. Children can follow these guides or mix and match to build their own structures.

111 ALL-WOOD PIECES – The package includes 111 pieces made of real, high-quality maple wood. Each has indentations that can be used to connect it with others. Pieces are included for the roof, roof facade, walls, chimney, porch, fences, bonfire, and bonfire seats.

COLORFUL DESIGN – These exquisitely crafted LINCOLN LOGS are beautifully stained, like a true cabin’s finish. Each piece is colored with precision and careful attention to detail to evoke the nostalgia of childhood. Most of the log blocks are stained bright brown. The face of the roof is a muted red, and the rooftops are forest-green.Care- Spot or wipe clean

EASY AND QUICK CLEAN-UP – All the pieces can be stored in the set’s collectible tin. The features make clean-up easier, as parents can store it in one container, keeping living spaces and children’s playing areas tidy and organized. The covered tin can be stored after play time for safe keeping.

AMERICA’S NATIONAL TOY– Invented in 1916 by John Lloyd Wright, the son of architect Frank Lloyd Wright, LINCOLN LOGS have become America’s National Toy. Beloved by four generations of builders, they provide hours of fun while building a solid foundation in STEAM/STEM subjects.
body.description: Inspired by one of the original builds of LINCOLN LOGS, the “Meeting House,” the LINCOLN LOGS 100th Anniversary Tin will make children happy and make older generations nostalgic. These logs are not only toys for preschoolers; they are fit for any kids-at-heart. This toy truly commemorates 100 years of LINCOLN LOGS. Each tin contains 111 pieces. Entirely USA-made, these blocks are real, high-quality maple wood. Every piece has indentations that let them connect to each other. Pieces are included for the roof, roof facade, wall logs, chimney, porch, fences, bonfire, and bonfire seats. This classic set comes with three construction ideas: a tall tower, two small houses with a bonfire, and a large cabin. Children can use these easy-to-follow instructions as a guide, or can go freestyle and create their own structures. The STEAM/STEM building concepts are appropriate for children at the preschool level. Children’s cognitive skills will develop when they play with this toy. Playtime will enhance their creativity as they analyze where each part should go, and will give them a sense of accomplishment when they’re done. Playing with this STEM toy is a building block to a child’s growth.All the parts of this educational toy can be stored in the collectible tin. Each beautifully crafted piece is traditionally colored and stained with precision and careful attention to detail to evoke the feel of childhood nostalgia.LINCOLN LOGS is America’s National Toy, with 100 years of providing an original, high-quality log-building toy to children ages 3 and up. LINCOLN LOGS is a classic toy that spans four generations of builders and inspires young minds to create and imagine.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Colorful Design Each beautifully crafted piece is traditionally colored and stained with precision and careful attention to detail. Made of Maple wood These blocks are real, high-quality maple wood that have connecting indentations to help stimulate and develop children’s cognitive skills. Collectible Storage Tin Celebrate 100 years of the classic Lincoln Logs toy that spans four generations of builders and inspires young minds to create and imagine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My kids love playing with this. Great quality and enough pieces to build a couple of different designs. I love the tin storage for it as in the future if we get more there is plenty more room to store more Lincoln logs. B

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Who doesn’t love these?! In my house we are obsessed. Quality & value is great. Super cute set. Love the tin for storage. Great as a gift for any kiddo who likes to build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hours of Fun
reviews.reviewText: Still an awesome toy for kids who like to build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lincoln logs are classic! They remind me of my own childhood. When my nephew opened his set i got him , immediately i had a memory of my own set and it was a cherished memory! These are still made with the same quality as i remember of 25 years ago

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good set, inexpensive. My grandsons loves it. You can’t go wrong with Lincoln logs for a gift for a four year old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not enough pieces
reviews.reviewText: Classic lincoln logs, just like you remember. Unfortunately this set doesn’t have enough pieces to build the cabin in the picture on the tin. Total meltdown of a four year old on my living room floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband is 75 years old and had a few pieces from when he was younger. He always wanted to have a set so he could play with his grandsons. it warms my heart to see him sitting and playing with them and even introduced his older items into the set. The Lincoln logs come in a very sturdy tin, so easily cleaned up. The items are well sanded and not sharp. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars as good as I remembered
reviews.reviewText: Good ol’ Lincoln Logs, just like the ones my kids had in the 1970s. I gave it to one, now 56, so he could share it with his kids. Good container too. Love them.
So much better than I expected, well packaged, elegant, and fun to play. Instructions make it hard for children to build themselves, will need teen or parent guidance.

reviews.reviewTitle: Few pieces, big container, not many options for building
reviews.reviewText: I have wonderful memories of lincoln logs and bought this for my daughter hoping she would love it just as much. The packaging is great- a huge tin we could use for many purposes. The tin is not however made for the lincoln logs set packaged in it-5 of those could fit inside. Yes it has 100 and whatever pieces as in the labelling but mostly the small corners pieces, leaving not many possibilities for creative building (not many long pieces for walls or enough roof). It was so overpriced and my daughter is so uninterested. It was my worst Christmas purchase by far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 24, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Good, but not too many blocks. The bucket is only 1/3 full
My kids played with this and now I’ve bought them for my grand kids. They’re expensive but hold up to the test of time. And I love that they use their imagination.
